alert.note: Alert for San Rafael Swell (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 26 at 7:23PM MDT until May 28 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM FRIDAY TO 10 PM MDT SATURDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 489 BELOW 6500 FEET... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 489 San Rafael Swell. * WINDS...Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. Winds will decrease during the overnight hours and increase once again by late morning in most locations. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...Daytime minimum humidities 9 to 15 percent. Overnight humidity recoveries around 20 to 30 percent. * IMPACTS...Critical fire weather conditions are possible. Any new fire starts or existing fires may spread rapidly.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now...or are imminent. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
